turn-on-cam-message: Bitte schalten Sie ihre Webcam hier unten ein.
waiting-participant: Bitte warten Sie, bis ihr Kontakt an diesem Anruf teilnehmt.
participant-cam-off: Ihr Kontakt ist der Videoanruf beigetreten, aber seine Webcam ist ausgeschaltet.
participant-left: Ihr Kontakt hat den Anruf verlassen.

dialog.title: Capabilities verification
dialog.description: To ensure that video call work, we are verifying the following:
dialog.autoclose: Everything seems to work, this dialog will be dismissed in a few seconds.

camera.granted: The camera and microphone permission has been granted.
camera.denied: The camera and microphone permission has been denied.
camera.waiting: The camera and microphone permission is needed so you contact can see and hear you.

cookie.granted: The cookie permission has been granted.
cookie.denied: The cookie permission has been denied.
cookie.waiting: The necessary cookie permission is needed for our video call third party to establish the call.

errors.title: Something didn't work
errors.desc: An error occurred and will probably prevent you to see your contact, here is the detail of the error:

errors.error-1655267250: The call you're trying to join does not exist or has expired.
errors.error--1494481250: The call you're trying to join is no longer available.
errors.error-763909797: An unknown error happened during the call.
errors.error--140619965: The call is now locked (too many people already joined or call has expired).
errors.camera-error--621623973: The camera or microphone has not been allowed.
errors.camera-error--1412228987: The camera or microphone reported an error (hardware or software issue on your device).
